useCase.name: Register Services
useCase.description: Organizations A, B, and C register their services in the Orca Registry.

preconditions.precondition: All organizations have issued URA VC and Service VC.

successEndConditions.condition: All services are now registered in the registry.

mainSequence.step: Organization A issues URA VC and Service VC to itself.
Organization A publishes URA VP and Service VP to the registry.
Organization B issues URA VC and Service VC to itself.
Organization B publishes URA VP and Service VP to the registry.
Organization C issues URA VC and Service VC to itself.
Organization C publishes URA VP and Service VP to the registry.
